scripts.package: rm -f chrome-header-mod.zip && zip -r chrome-header-mod.zip . -x '*.git*' '*tools*' '*node_modules*' '*.zip' '*.DS_Store' package.json README.md LICENSE package-lock.json icons/icon.svg icons/README.txt
scripts.build: npm run debug:off && npm run package && npm run debug:on && npm run unpackage
